trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZF002_03461_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Ciuille needs someone to rescue her from a culinary mishap.
TEXT_LUCKZF002_03461_TODO_00<tab>Slay blue deer does and obtain their meat.
TEXT_LUCKZF002_03461_TODO_01<tab>Set the doe meat as bait at the designated location.
TEXT_LUCKZF002_03461_TODO_02<tab>Lie in wait for the scarred caracal and slay it when it appears.
TEXT_LUCKZF002_03461_TODO_03<tab>Return the doe meat and caracal blood to Ciuille.
TEXT_LUCKZF002_03461_CIUILLE_000_001<tab>Ah, a savior appears in my most desperate moment! Who? Why, that would be you, of course.

TEXT_LUCKZF002_03461_CIUILLE_000_002<tab>You see, I became so absorbed in my work, I failed to notice I lacked the provisions to apply the final touches. I would procure them myself, but I cannot very well leave the food to cool.
TEXT_LUCKZF002_03461_CIUILLE_000_003<tab>That is why I must ask you for help. Please, would you gather meat and blood and return them to me? You have my word you will not go unrewarded.
TEXT_LUCKZF002_03461_CIUILLE_100_004<tab>Splendid! You have no idea how much your aid means to me.

TEXT_LUCKZF002_03461_CIUILLE_000_004<tab>The task is a simple one, but requires several steps. In order to obtain the fresh blood I require, you must draw out a scarred caracal with the meat of its prey.

TEXT_LUCKZF002_03461_CIUILLE_000_005<tab>They are known to hunt blue deer does, which can be found near Bowrest. Embark on a hunt of your own, and place two pieces of the doe meat as bait near trees around the camp.

TEXT_LUCKZF002_03461_CIUILLE_000_006<tab>The rest is painless. Slay any caracals that come seeking an easy meal, and bring me their blood. This task is more vital than you can know, but I trust you to get it done.
TEXT_LUCKZF002_03461_CIUILLE_000_010<tab>Use the doe meat to draw out the caracals, and bring their blood back to me. A simple enough task for one of your capabilities.
TEXT_LUCKZF002_03461_CIUILLE_000_040<tab>How goes the hunt? Do you have the ingredients?
TEXT_LUCKZF002_03461_CIUILLE_000_041<tab>I knew you were up to the challenge! Gods bless the day I met an ally of Ronka!
TEXT_LUCKZF002_03461_CIUILLE_000_042<tab>This meal is no ordinary one. I am preparing it for my companions who were wounded while patrolling the Greatwood.

TEXT_LUCKZF002_03461_CIUILLE_000_043<tab>It is meant to help the body mend, and for that I needed the lifeblood and flesh of a beast most savage. It is a wonder I overlooked such ingredients in the first place...
TEXT_LUCKZF002_03461_CIUILLE_000_044<tab>Nonetheless, I thank you for your help. We shall toast in your honor!
